title.narrative: National, county, communities and civil society champions are convened and supported to adopt policies, systems and actions that increase the density and quality of citizen engagement in devolved service delivery.
Citizen-Centric Braintrust formed and functioning.
Devolution Sector Working Group (DSWG) coordination documents with joint priorities, results and accountability framework.
County peer learning activities delivered on various devolved service areas.
Enhanced collaboration, partnership and learning in the Devolution Sector
Devolution Sector Working Group Functioning to the satisfaction of stakeholders

Develop technical assistance (TA) and Capacity Development to National and County Governments Service Delivery Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) to improve Public Financial Management (PFM), Human Resource (HR) and (M&E).
Harmonized reporting template developed.
Generation of county level statistics to support research and informed policy decisions
Number and timeliness of Gross County Product (GCP) reports
Enhanced Revenue mobilization and efficiency in spending for service delivery.
Timely and quality Own Source Revenue (OSR) study, Performance Expenditure Reports (PERs).

Develop technical assistance (TA) and Capacity Development to National and County Governments Service Delivery Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) to improve Public Financial Management (PFM), Human Resource (HR) and (M&E).
Model for complementary Service Delivery Indicators focused M&E developed and rolled out
Strengthened policies, systems and processes for Public Financial Management (PFM), M&E and Human Resource Management (HRM) which address bottlenecks to service delivery.
% Increase in performance on County HRM Maturation lndex (for at least 3 counties) HRM tools developed and deployed to counties
Improved fiscal projections, revenue policies and administration systems, debt management and fiscal transparency at the national and county level
Deviations between actual and projected revenue less than 5 percent at National; At least a third of the revenue potential at Counties raised; A capital investment and financing plan for projects.

National, county, communities and civil society champions are convened and supported to adopt policies, systems and actions that increase the density and quality of citizen engagement in devolved service delivery.
Annual citizen forum on devolved service delivery progress and performance barriers held.

Abilities (Uwezo) - government and non-government partners are provided with policy and technicl support to develop and pilot tools, systems and skills that improve the quality and density of citizen engagement in service delivery.
Integrated citizen engagement toolkit developed.

National and county governments implement an integrated platform for citizen engagement across the service delivery cycle that strengthens accountability, enhances inclusion and ensures social sustainability.
National government institutionalizes an integrated approach to citizen engagement and citizen-centric service delivery in core country performance, capacity building and knowledge sharing systems.
Generation of county level statistics to support research and informed policy decisions
Enterprise survey

Develop technical assistance (TA) and Capacity Development to National and County Governments Service Delivery Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) to improve Public Financial Management (PFM), Human Resource (HR) and (M&E).
Road Map and user requirements for electronic government procurement portal (e-GP) and deployed to service delivery MDAs
Increased sustainability of operations and maintenance (O&M) activities in health facilities.

No. of counties with health comprising at least 22% of their budget, excluding conditional grants, with the composition increasing annually, but not needing to exceed 30%.
***Being tracked under "Funds from PHC for KADP".
